item.title: My First Post
item.description: my first blog fn main() { println!("Hello world!"); }

Hello friend, I’m a researcher and Red Team Leader doing pentesting, red teams, purple teams since 2011. I have worked in Portugal, Australia, and currently at Advisense in Oslo, Norway. I try to publish as often as possible on my YouTube channel , and my blog . I’ve also contributed to the Exploit Database and Google Hacking Database with a few shellcodes developed while writing blog posts on my previous blog .
